nodes.text: Chesea was a female Ewok, and wife of Leektar, with whom she mothered three woklings. She and presumably all three of her children were killed in an fire in Red Bush Grove, their home village.
Chesea was a character developed by Andrew Gilbertson as part of Leektar's What's The Story? Entry. She was named after Gilbertson's friend Chelsea in a Freudian slip.[source?]
